ctu_text: The scholarship will provide offline coaching facilities by renowned IAS mentors from the Alternative Learning System (ALS), Delhi, and will be held at the State Academy Training (SAT) at Takyelpat with state government funding. The first phase of the coaching program began on November 8, 2021, and will last until April 2022. The scholarship aims to help candidates avoid expensive coaching programs outside the state and provide them with an opportunity to receive quality civil service training within the state\n"}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Online", "url": "https://als. viewpage.
